parameters.name: NetworkInterfaceId
parameters.description: The ID of ENI N. You must specify `NetworkInterfaceId` or `NetworkInterfacePermissionId.N` to determine the query range.

parameters.name: NetworkInterfacePermissionId
parameters.description: The IDs of ENI permissions. You can specify up to 100 ENI permission IDs.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Maximum value: 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the ENI permission. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
